com.zebra.sdk.common.card.job

Interface JobUtil

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ZebraCardPrinter, ZebraPrinterZmotif, ZebraPrinterZxp

    public interface JobUtil
    An interface used to define functions used in job related operations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel(int jobID)
      Cancels all jobs or a specific job.
      void destroy()
      Clean up all the resources and stop any running threads.
      void ejectCard()
      Sends the card to the eject bin.
      java.util.List<JobStatus> getJobList()
      Returns a list of all the current jobs in the printer's queue.
      JobStatusInfo getJobStatus(int jobId)
      Returns the job status for the specified jobId.
      int magEncode(int copies, String track1Data, String track2Data, String track3Data)
      Encodes a magnetic card for the current job.
      int positionCard()
      Moves a card from the specified source to the specified destination.
      int print(int copies, java.util.List<GraphicsInfo> graphicsData)
      Prints a card with the images provided.
      int printAndMagEncode(int copies, java.util.List<GraphicsInfo> graphicsData, String track1Data, String track2Data, String track3Data)
      Encodes the magnetic encoding data and prints a card with the images provided.

      Prints a card with the provided template.

      Reads the data from a magnetically encoded card.

      Reads the data from a magnetically encoded card.
      void reprint(int copies)
      Reprints the last rendered job.
      void resume()
      Resumes the processing of a held job such as a smart card encoding job.
      void setGraphics(ZebraGraphicsI zebraCardGraphics)
      Sets the zebraCardGraphics object.
      int smartCardEncode(int copies)
      Positions a card at the smartcard station, suspends the job to allow the card to be read or encoded, and waits for resume() to be called before completing the job.

    • Method Detail

      • cancel

        void cancel(int jobID)
            throws ConnectionException,
                   ZebraCardException
        Cancels all jobs or a specific job.
        Parameters:
        jobID - the ID of the job to cancel.
        • Set jobID to '0' to cancel all jobs.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.

      • ejectCard

        void ejectCard()
               throws ConnectionException,
                      ZebraCardException
        Sends the card to the eject bin.
        • A smartcard encoding job is a separate activity and the card cannot be ejected from the encoder. The job must be resumed or aborted.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.

      • getJobList

        java.util.List<JobStatus> getJobList()
                                     throws ConnectionException,
                                            ZebraCardException
        Returns a list of all the current jobs in the printer's queue.
        • For ZXP Series printers this operation is only guaranteed with the current printer instance.
        Returns:
        List containing all the current jobs in the printer's queue.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.

      • getJobStatus

        JobStatusInfo getJobStatus(int jobId)
                           throws ConnectionException,
                                  ZebraCardException
        Returns the job status for the specified jobId.
        • For ZXP Series printers this operation is only guaranteed with the current printer instance.
        Parameters:
        jobId - ID number of the job.
        Returns:
        instance containing the requested job status information.
        • ZXP Series printers will not report the card position.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs or jobId is invalid.

      • positionCard

        int positionCard()
                 throws ConnectionException,
                        SettingsException,
                        ZebraCardException
        Moves a card from the specified source to the specified destination.
        • CardSource and CardDestination can be individually set prior to calling this method otherwise the default values of CardSource.Feeder and CardDestination.Eject will be used.
        Returns:
        the assigned job ID number.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if the job settings are not valid.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.

      • magEncode

        int magEncode(int copies,
            String track1Data,
            String track2Data,
            String track3Data)
              throws ConnectionException,
                     SettingsException,
                     ZebraCardException
        Encodes a magnetic card for the current job.
        Parameters:
        copies - number of copies to be printed.
        track1Data - data to be encoded on track 1.
        track2Data - data to be encoded on track 2.
        track3Data - data to be encoded on track 3.
        Returns:
        the assigned job ID number.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if the job settings are not valid.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs or if the specified arguments are invalid.

      • print

        int print(int copies,
        java.util.List<GraphicsInfo> graphicsData)
          throws ConnectionException,
                 SettingsException,
                 ZebraCardException
        Prints a card with the images provided.
        Parameters:
        copies - number of copies to be printed.
        graphicsData - List containing details of the images to be printed.
        Returns:
        the assigned job ID number.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if the job settings are not valid.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs or if the specified arguments are invalid.

      • printTemplate

        int printTemplate(int copies,
                TemplateJob jobData)
                  throws ConnectionException,
                         SettingsException,
                         ZebraCardException
        Prints a card with the provided template.
        Parameters:
        copies - number of copies to be printed.
        jobData - instance containing details of the job to be executed.
        Returns:
        the assigned job ID number.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if the job settings are not valid.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs or if the specified arguments are invalid.

      • printAndMagEncode

        int printAndMagEncode(int copies,
                    java.util.List<GraphicsInfo> graphicsData,
                    String track1Data,
                    String track2Data,
                    String track3Data)
                      throws ConnectionException,
                             SettingsException,
                             ZebraCardException
        Encodes the magnetic encoding data and prints a card with the images provided.
        Parameters:
        copies - number of copies to be printed.
        graphicsData - List containing details of the images to be printed.
        track1Data - data to be encoded on track 1.
        track2Data - data to be encoded on track 2.
        track3Data - data to be encoded on track 3.
        Returns:
        the assigned job ID number.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if the job settings are not valid.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs or if the specified arguments are invalid.

      • readMagData

        MagTrackData readMagData(java.util.EnumSet<DataSource> tracksToRead)
                         throws ConnectionException,
                                SettingsException,
                                ZebraCardException,
                                java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Reads the data from a magnetically encoded card.
        Parameters:
        tracksToRead - specifies which tracks to read data from.
        Returns:
        instance containing the magnetic data read from the card.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if the job settings are not valid.
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - if the process times out trying to read the data.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs or tracksToRead is invalid.

      • readMagData

        MagTrackData readMagData(java.util.EnumSet<DataSource> tracksToRead,
                       boolean isVerbose)
                         throws ConnectionException,
                                SettingsException,
                                java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException,
                                ZebraCardException
        Reads the data from a magnetically encoded card.
        Parameters:
        tracksToRead - specifies which tracks to read data from.
        isVerbose - true to increase the amount of detail presented to the user.
        Returns:
        instance containing the magnetic data read from the card.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if the job settings are not valid.
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - if the process times out trying to read the data.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs or tracksToRead is invalid.

      • reprint

        void reprint(int copies)
             throws ConnectionException,
                    ZebraCardException
        Reprints the last rendered job.
        Parameters:
        copies - number of copies to reprint.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs or copies is invalid.

      • resume

        void resume()
            throws ZebraCardException,
                   ConnectionException
        Resumes the processing of a held job such as a smart card encoding job.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.

      • smartCardEncode

        int smartCardEncode(int copies)
                    throws ConnectionException,
                           SettingsException,
                           ZebraCardException
        Positions a card at the smartcard station, suspends the job to allow the card to be read or encoded, and waits for resume() to be called before completing the job.
        • Smartcard job settings must be configured prior to calling this method in order to specify the card type.
        Parameters:
        copies - number of cards to be encoded.
        Returns:
        the assigned job ID number.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if the job settings are not valid.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs or copies is invalid.

      • destroy

        void destroy()
             throws ZebraCardException
        Clean up all the resources and stop any running threads.
        Throws:
        ZebraCardException - if the device is busy, a printer error, or there is an error communicating with the printer.

      • setGraphics

        void setGraphics(ZebraGraphicsI zebraCardGraphics)
        Sets the zebraCardGraphics object.
        Parameters:
        zebraCardGraphics - Instance of ZebraCardGraphics.
